metadata.title: CVE-2024-50235 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: cfg80211: clear wdev->cqm_config pointer on freeWhen we free wdev->cqm_config when unregistering, we alsoneed to clear out the pointer since the same wdev/netdevmay get re-registered in another network namespace, thendestroyed later, running this code again, which results ina double-free.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
